ygData.subject: Aqualung Trivial Point FOUND!
ygData.msgSnippet: Fellow Tinkers, I come before you to announce that I have found the sought after number. My tinkering is now at 148 and Aqualungs are trivial to make. Upon
ygData.messageBody:
Fellow Tinkers,

I come before you to announce that I have found the sought after number.
My tinkering is now at 148 and Aqualungs are trivial to make.

Upon reaching 148, I made my first Rebreather and it's a beaut. :o)

Tomorrow I will post a long email to the tinkering onelist detailing my exact
failure, success, and skill raise history (too tired now :o). The main point
is
that I'm getting 7 out of 9 successes on Aqualungs over a sampling of 180
tries.

I offer this information in the spirit of sharing that has always permeated
this
email list. Please post the location of diamond dust if you're reading Mr.
Anon.
Share and play nice with others. :o)

Now, in regard to the GM that said they were waiting for tinkers to get higher
before they finished putting the GemCutter in-game. We're there! Do it!!!!
;O)

Flintnilf Ironori
Level 42 wizard of Solusek Ro
Master Tinker of 148 skill
Squire of Dark Valor
Povar Server
